title: Draw MERMAID.JS in real time
body:
There are multiple times when you want to use a graph diagram using Mermaid.js, and a tool to draw real -time drawing is summarized and real -time drawing method. ## Introduction `` `bash $ NPM I MERMAID $ NPM I-Save-Dev @Types/MERMAID `` ` ## drawing -Component.html `` `HTML
Sequencediagram Alice- >> Bob: Hello
`` ` -Component.ts `` `TS Import Mermaid from 'Mermaid' MERMAID.INITIALIZE ({Startonload: True}) `` ` ! [Image] (https://user- Images.githubuserContent.com/29157528/169693934-b1677538-4ded-A905-da1a7c0EDF09.png) ## Let it drawn again in the place that has already been drawn -Component.html `` `HTML
Sequencediagram Alice- >> Bob: Hello
`` ` -Component.ts `` `TS Import Mermaid from 'Mermaid' @ViewChild ('Mermaid') Mermaiddiv!: ElementRef ; // If MERMAID is already drawn, delete it because the Data-PROCESSED attribute is granted MERMAIDDIV.NATIVEELEMENT.REMOVEATTRIBUTE ('data-processed'); // Enter the text to be drawn as innerhtml (In the case of InnerText, it is necessary to use INNERHTML because the line break becomes a BR tag.) MERMAIDDIV.NATIVEELement.innerhtml = txt; // Initialization (drawing) processing Mermaid.init ('#Mermaid'); `` ` ## At the end Based on the above implementation, we have created a page that draws Mermaid.js in real time and facilitates the description. [Mermaid Live Editor] (https://portal.kemu.site/tools/mermaid/)
